headlines.headline: Mavericks waiving Tyus Jones, signing Ryan Nembhard to 2-year deal
headlines.description: The Dallas Mavericks are waiving veteran Tyus Jones, and signing two-way guard Ryan Nembhard to a new two-year contract, Todd Ramasar and Jaafar Choufani of Life Sports Agency told ESPN.

headlines.headline: Fantasy basketball picks, DFS and betting tips for Saturday's NBA games
headlines.description: Jim McCormick breaks down Saturday's NBA games and offers his top fantasy streamers as well as his favorite bets and DFS plays.

headlines.headline: Nuggets' Jokic calls out Thunder's Dort for 'unnecessary' foul
headlines.description: Thunder guard Lu Dort was called for a flagrant foul 2 and ejected from Friday night's game after appearing to trip Nuggets star Nikola Jokic, who called the play "an unnecessary move."

headlines.headline: Pacers face the Grizzlies on 5-game slide
headlines.description: Memphis Grizzlies (22-36, 11th in the Western Conference) vs. Indiana Pacers (15-45, 15th in the Eastern Conference)

headlines.headline: Philadelphia faces Boston on 3-game win streak
headlines.description: Philadelphia 76ers (33-26, sixth in the Eastern Conference) vs. Boston Celtics (39-20, second in the Eastern Conference)

headlines.headline: Oklahoma City visits Dallas after overtime win against Denver
headlines.description: Oklahoma City Thunder (46-15, first in the Western Conference) vs. Dallas Mavericks (21-38, 12th in the Western Conference)

headlines.headline: NFL draft: Ranking Fernando Mendoza vs. recent first-round QBs
headlines.description: Let's rank every quarterback picked in Round 1 from 2021 to 2025 based on predraft evaluations -- and then slot in the expected No. 1 pick for 2026.

headlines.headline: Jerry Jones sees Cowboys being bigger spenders in free agency
headlines.description: Cowboys owner and general manager Jerry Jones acknowledged Friday that he has let the fans down with Dallas' championship drought and has promised change -- starting with the team's approach to free agency.

headlines.headline: 2026 NFL combine: Top draft prospects, best workouts, risers
headlines.description: Day 2 saw speedy defensive backs and a couple of tight ends put on a show. Here are our experts on the combine's top workouts.

headlines.headline: 2026 NFL combine: Dillon Thieneman, Sonny Styles lead best photos
headlines.description: The NFL combine puts top prospects in front of countless cameras, and because they're sprinting full speed or lifting heavy weights, the result is often some hilariously intense facial expressions.

headlines.headline: Why Ty Simpson feels he is a franchise quarterback
headlines.description: Ty Simpson speaks to the media at the NFL combine about proving himself as a franchise quarterback.

headlines.headline: Mendoza speaks at the NFL combine: ‘I mean who hasn't admired Tom Brady?’
headlines.description: Projected No. 1 pick Fernando Mendoza speaks to the media at the NFL combine about the opportunity to work with Tom Brady if he goes to the Raiders.

headlines.headline: Lightning play the Sabres, look to extend home win streak

headlines.headline: Kreider beats Hellebuyck in OT to lift the Ducks past the Jets, 5-4
headlines.description: — Chris Kreider beat Connor Hellebuyck off a rebound at 4:47 of overtime to give the Anaheim Ducks a 5-4 victory over the Winnipeg Jets on Friday night.

headlines.headline: Mammoth beat Minnesota 5-2 to end the Wild's winning streak at 6
headlines.description: — Lawson Crouse scored twice, U.S. Olympian Clayton Keller had a goal and two assists and the Utah Mammoth beat Minnesota 5-2 on Friday night to end the Wild's winning streak at six games.
